title: Phase 1 Automation Backlog - Prioritized by Impact/Effort
methodology: Impact/Effort matrix scoring (1-5 scale each), ROI = Impact / Effort

impact.5_critical: Eliminates major bottleneck, affects multiple departments, > $50K annual value
impact.4_high: Significantly reduces friction, department-wide benefit, $20-50K annual value
impact.3_medium: Meaningful improvement, team-level benefit, $10-20K annual value

effort.5_very_high: > 90 days, multiple systems, high complexity, requires vendors

tier_1_quick_wins.description: 60-90 day implementations, high ROI, foundational automations

automations.name: Single Intake Router + Auto-Acknowledgment
automations.trigger: WhatsApp Business, Email to intake@, Web form submission
automations.action: Classify request, route to appropriate system (MaintainX, ServiceDesk, Jira, Manual), assign owner, set SLA, send acknowledgment
automations.output: Ticket created, requester notified with ID and SLA
automations.impact_rationale: Eliminates scattered communication (WhatsApp/email/verbal), reduces lost requests, improves SLA tracking, affects ALL departments
automations.effort_rationale: WhatsApp Business API setup + Claude classification + routing logic; minimal integration complexity
risks: Initial classification accuracy may be 70-80%, requires tuning

automations.name: POS-ERP Daily Reconciliation Bot
automations.trigger: Daily EOD close (7:00 AM scheduled run)
automations.action: Extract POS data (Opera/Simphony/Micros), extract ERP data (Satcom/CMNET), match transactions, identify exceptions, classify by reason code, generate report, alert Finance if critical
automations.output: Daily exception report (CSV + summary email), trend analysis
automations.impact_rationale: Eliminates 2-3 hours/day manual reconciliation, reduces month-end close time, catches errors early
automations.effort_rationale: Data extraction from APIs + matching logic + reporting; moderate scripting, low integration complexity
risks: POS-ERP schema mapping may need manual validation initially

automations.name: Preventive Maintenance Auto-Scheduler with Parts Check
automations.trigger: Monthly calendar generation, Equipment due per intervals
automations.action: Identify assets due for PM, check spare parts in SAP/CMNET, flag shortages, optimize schedule (criticality, blackouts, capacity), create MaintainX work orders with checklists, assign technicians, notify Operations
automations.output: Monthly PM schedule, parts reorder alerts, work orders in MaintainX
automations.impact_rationale: Shifts from reactive to preventive maintenance, reduces emergency repairs, extends equipment life, prevents stockouts
automations.effort_rationale: Asset register integration + MaintainX API + SAP inventory check + scheduling optimization logic
automations.estimated_annual_value: $60,000 (reduced downtime: ~10 critical failures avoided × $5K each + PM time saved)
risks: Asset register may be incomplete, requiring manual data cleanup

automations.name: Contract Template Router with SLA Tracking
automations.trigger: Sales closed (Comversa), Event confirmed (LTH), Vendor agreement needed
automations.action: Select contract template, populate with deal terms, route to Legal with SLA timer, track review progress, alert if SLA approaching, capture changes/feedback, finalize and route for signatures
automations.output: Contract draft to Legal, SLA dashboard, signed contract archived
automations.impact_rationale: Major bottleneck resolved (15-30 day delays → < 10 days), accelerates sales cycle, improves cash flow
automations.effort_rationale: Template library setup + workflow routing + SLA tracking; low integration complexity
automations.estimated_annual_value: $40,000 (accelerated cash flow from faster closings + Legal time saved)
risks: Template coverage may not be 100%, some contracts still need custom drafting

automations.name: Housekeeping Room Readiness Tracker
automations.trigger: Guest check-out in Opera, Arrival scheduled, Room status change
automations.action: Generate cleaning task, assign to housekeeping, track progress, alert on lencería shortages, trigger inspection, update Opera room status, notify Front Desk when ready
automations.output: Real-time room status, readiness ETA, lencería alerts
automations.impact_rationale: Improves guest satisfaction (faster check-in), reduces coordination overhead, tracks SLA (< 30 min response time)
automations.effort_rationale: Opera PMS integration + task workflow + notification logic
automations.estimated_annual_value: $18,000 (time saved in coordination + guest satisfaction improvement)
risks: Opera API limitations may require workarounds
success_metrics: Room readiness SLA < 30 min cleaning, < 45 min total

automations.name: Approval Fast-Track with Auto-Routing
automations.process: Purchase orders, Payment requests, Budget variances
automations.action: Validate documentation completeness, determine approval path per authority matrix, route to first approver, send notifications, track SLA, auto-escalate if approaching deadline, log all approvals
automations.output: Approval status dashboard, SLA compliance tracking, audit trail
automations.impact_rationale: Eliminates approval bottlenecks (3-7 days → < 3 days), improves supplier relations, enables timely procurement
automations.effort_rationale: Workflow engine setup + approval matrix configuration + integration with SAP/CMNET + notification system
automations.estimated_annual_value: $38,000 (time saved in approvals + avoided delays + supplier discounts for prompt payment)
risks: Change management: managers must adopt digital approval workflow
success_metrics: Approval cycle time < 3 days for standard, < 24h for urgent

tier_1_quick_wins.tier_1_total_effort: 165 days (can be parallelized across ~2-3 months with team)

tier_2_high_value.description: 3-6 month implementations, significant ROI, domain-specific automations

automations.name: Recipe Costing Agent with Live Pricing
automations.trigger: New recipe submitted, Recipe modified, Weekly price refresh
automations.action: Extract ingredients from recipe, query SAP for latest prices, calculate cost per serving, recommend selling price per target margin, flag if price > 30 days old, attach photo, route for approval to Costos and Chef
automations.output: Costed recipe sheet, price recommendations, approval workflow
automations.impact_rationale: Reduces costing time 3-5 days → < 4 hours, enables dynamic menu pricing, improves food cost % control
automations.effort_rationale: SAP price API + recipe parsing (NLP) + cost calculation + workflow integration; moderate complexity
automations.estimated_annual_value: $32,000 (time saved: 3 days/recipe × 30 recipes/year + 0.5% food cost improvement)
dependencies: Recipe database or structured input format
risks: Ingredient matching may require manual validation for new items

automations.name: Buffet Demand Forecaster
automations.trigger: Daily forecast run (48h before service), Occupancy update
automations.action: Extract occupancy forecast (Opera), analyze historical consumption patterns, apply seasonality factors, calculate production range (± 10%), generate prep list, integrate with daily kitchen schedule
automations.output: Production forecast with confidence range, prep list
automations.impact_rationale: Reduces food waste (currently high), improves guest satisfaction (reduces shortages), optimizes labor
automations.effort_rationale: Historical data analysis + forecasting model (ML) + Opera integration + kitchen system integration
automations.estimated_annual_value: $22,000 (waste reduction: 3% → 1.5% of buffet cost ~$150K annual = $2.25K + labor optimization)
risks: Special events and groups may skew forecasts, requires override capability

automations.name: Logistics Tracking Hub with Delay Alerts
automations.trigger: PO issued, Tracking number received, Scheduled status refresh (8 AM, 2 PM)
automations.action: Query carrier APIs (DHL, ASPB, MAERSK, DELPA), calculate transit time vs expected, detect delays, classify severity, alert logistics team and destination, generate receiving checklist (safety/inocuity), notify 24h before arrival
automations.output: Tracking dashboard, delay alerts, receiving checklists
automations.impact_rationale: Eliminates manual email tracking, proactive delay management, improves OTIF, enables better receiving preparation
automations.effort_rationale: Multi-carrier API integration + delay detection logic + receiving checklist templates + notification system
automations.estimated_annual_value: $30,000 (time saved: 1 hr/day tracking + delay cost avoidance + receiving efficiency)
risks: Carrier API reliability may vary, need fallback to manual checks
success_metrics: Delay alerts within 2 hours of detection

automations.name: KPI Data Validation & Auto-Reporting
automations.trigger: Monthly data drop from business units (Day 1 of month)
automations.action: Extract data from source systems (SAP, Opera, CMNET, etc.), apply schema validation, reconcile against auxiliaries, flag distortions, request clarifications, generate clean dataset, populate presentation templates, send to Finance/Control de Gestión
automations.output: Validated KPI dataset, exception log, presentation-ready reports
affected_roles: Coordinadora Nacional de Control de Gestión (BF)
automations.impact_rationale: Reduces manual reconciliation and reclassification time, improves KPI accuracy, accelerates reporting
automations.effort_rationale: Multi-system data extraction + validation rules + reconciliation logic + presentation generation; high integration complexity
risks: Source data quality issues may require manual intervention initially

automations.name: IT Incident Auto-Classification & Routing
automations.trigger: Ticket created in ServiceDesk Plus, Email to IT support
automations.action: Parse ticket description, classify issue type (network, hardware, software, access), determine urgency, assign to appropriate team/technician, set SLA, send acknowledgment, escalate if SLA approaching
automations.output: Classified and routed tickets, SLA tracking
automations.impact_rationale: Reduces ticket triage time, improves SLA compliance, enables better capacity planning
automations.effort_rationale: ServiceDesk API + classification model (Claude) + routing logic; low-medium complexity
automations.estimated_annual_value: $18,000 (time saved: 30 min/day triage × 250 days + SLA compliance improvement)
dependencies: IT team structure and assignment rules
risks: Classification accuracy may start at 75-80%, requires tuning

automations.name: Commercial CRM with Funnel Tracking
automations.trigger: Lead generated, Visit scheduled, Quote sent, Contract signed
automations.action: Capture lead source, track interactions (calls, visits, emails), record quote details, calculate conversion rates, flag stalled opportunities, generate sales reports, integrate with Opera (LTH) / contract system (Comversa)
automations.output: CRM database, funnel metrics dashboard, sales reports
automations.impact_rationale: Major visibility improvement, enables pipeline forecasting, identifies conversion bottlenecks, improves sales management
automations.effort_rationale: CRM platform selection + deployment + data migration + training + integration with Opera/contract system; high complexity
automations.estimated_annual_value: $55,000 (improved conversion: 1-2% increase in close rate on ~$2M pipeline + sales team efficiency)
risks: User adoption challenge (Excel → CRM transition)
Data migration may be incomplete

tier_3_strategic.description: 6-12 month implementations, transformational impact, complex integrations

automations.name: Enterprise Data Warehouse with BI Dashboards
automations.trigger: Continuous ETL, User queries, Scheduled reports
automations.action: ETL from all source systems (Opera, SAP, CMNET, Simphony, Satcom, etc.), normalize to common schema, build star schema data models, create Power BI dashboards per role, enable self-service analytics, automate executive reporting
automations.output: Unified data warehouse, role-based dashboards, automated reports
automations.impact_rationale: Transformational: single source of truth, eliminates manual reporting, enables data-driven decisions, foundation for advanced analytics/AI
automations.effort_rationale: Multi-system ETL + data modeling + DW infrastructure + dashboard development + training; very high complexity
automations.estimated_annual_value: $150,000 (reporting time saved across all companies + decision quality improvement + enables advanced analytics)
risks: Scope creep risk (start with core KPIs only)
Data quality issues require cleanup
success_metrics: Core KPIs available in DW by Month 6

automations.name: AI-Powered Chatbot for Guest/Customer Service
automations.trigger: Message received via web, WhatsApp, social media
automations.action: Classify inquiry type, respond to FAQs from knowledge base, check availability (Opera API), quote rates, escalate complex queries to human agents, log all interactions, analyze sentiment
automations.output: Automated responses, escalated tickets, interaction analytics
automations.impact_rationale: Improves guest experience (24/7 availability), reduces call center load, captures after-hours inquiries, enables multilingual support
automations.effort_rationale: Multi-channel integration + LLM fine-tuning + Opera integration + knowledge base creation + handoff logic; high complexity
automations.estimated_annual_value: $50,000 (call center time saved + after-hours conversion + guest satisfaction improvement)
risks: Guest expectations for human touch may limit chatbot scope
Language/cultural nuances require careful tuning

automations.name: Predictive Maintenance with IoT Sensors
automations.trigger: Sensor data thresholds exceeded, Scheduled analysis runs
automations.action: Collect sensor data (temperature, vibration, pressure), analyze trends, predict failures before they occur, generate preemptive work orders, optimize PM schedules based on actual condition, track equipment health
automations.output: Predictive maintenance alerts, condition-based PM schedules, equipment health dashboard
automations.impact_rationale: Prevents unplanned downtime, extends equipment life, optimizes PM frequency, reduces maintenance costs 15-25%
automations.effort_rationale: IoT sensor deployment + connectivity + data platform + ML model development + MaintainX integration; very high complexity and cost
automations.estimated_annual_value: $80,000 (downtime avoided + extended equipment life + optimized PM labor)
risks: High upfront sensor costs
Connectivity challenges in some locations
Requires 6-12 months data collection for accurate predictions
success_metrics: PM frequency optimized (reduced for healthy assets, increased for declining)

phase_1_months_1_3.resources_required: 2 full-time developers, 1 business analyst, part-time subject matter experts
phase_1_months_1_3.success_criteria: 6 Tier 1 automations live, 80% adoption, measurable time savings

phase_2_months_4_6.resources_required: 3 full-time developers (add ML/BI specialist), 1 business analyst, SMEs
phase_2_months_4_6.success_criteria: 6 Tier 2 automations live, KPI improvements measurable, user satisfaction > 80%

phase_3_months_7_12.resources_required: 4 full-time developers, 1 data engineer, 1 ML engineer, 1 IoT specialist, 1 business analyst, vendor support
phase_3_months_7_12.success_criteria: Data warehouse operational, chatbot deployed, IoT pilot complete

infrastructure: Claude API or similar LLM access

technical_risks: API availability/reliability → Build fallback mechanisms, monitor SLAs with vendors
Data quality issues → Phased data cleanup, validation rules, human oversight initially
Integration complexity → Start with APIs, use file exports as fallback, incremental integration
organizational_risks: User adoption challenges → Early involvement of users, training, gradual rollout, show quick wins
Process change resistance → Communicate benefits clearly, involve process owners, pilot programs
Competing priorities → Executive sponsorship, dedicated project resources, clear ROI communication
business_risks: Scope creep → Strict backlog prioritization, phased delivery, avoid feature bloat
Budget overruns → Start with low-effort/high-ROI items, prove value, secure additional funding
Vendor dependencies → Multi-vendor strategy where possible, contract SLAs, exit strategies

business_outcomes: Total time saved: > 5,000 hours/year across all companies by Month 12
Process cycle time reductions: 30-50% average across automated processes
Error rates: 50% reduction in reconciliation/data errors
Cost savings: $698K annual value realization by Year 2
operational_kpis: Automation adoption: > 80% of users engaging with automated processes
SLA compliance: > 85% across all tracked processes
System uptime: > 98% for critical automation systems
User satisfaction: > 75% satisfied or very satisfied with automations
strategic_indicators: Decision quality: Measurable improvement in data-driven decisions
Competitive advantage: Faster time-to-market, better customer experience
Scalability: Automation foundation enables growth without proportional headcount increases
Innovation readiness: Data infrastructure and automation culture enable advanced AI/ML initiatives
